name: Cronosphere
description: Cronosphere is the premier burning, reflection and auto liquidity token on the Cronos chain. With 4% auto liquidity, 3% token burns, 8% reflections and 1% development tax taken on every sale, Cronosphere is destined to reach the stars. Cronosphere will start with a supply of 1,000,000 $SPHERE and with each transaction, the supply will become lesser, creating scarcity and increasing the value of the $SPHERE token.
